channel.title: Still compiler says i still need jdk -.-----------------------------------------
channel.description:
THIS IS MAKING ME SO MAD! I've been working on this for 3 months. I have jdk 6 and updates 2, 4, and 5........Then adjusted my variables correctly............STILL IT DOESN'T WORK!
Any ideas of what I'm doing wrong??
Also I'm using the ultimate compiler 1.9.......Only one I want to use so don't give me any other compilers.......

item.title: Still compiler says i still need jdk -.-----------------------------------------
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:1, topic:187533”]THIS IS MAKING ME SO MAD! I’ve been working on this for 3 months. I have jdk 6 and updates 2, 4, and 5…Then adjusted my variables correctly…STILL IT DOESN’T WORK!

Any ideas of what I’m doing wrong??

Also I’m using the ultimate compiler 1.9…Only one I want to use so don’t give me any other compilers…[/quote]
try this code:

@echo off
title  Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

When you click on it, it should start compiling automatically

Read full topic
item.source: Still compiler says i still need jdk -.-----------------------------------------
